meta.id: not know where someone gets off
stems: not know where someone gets off

hwi.hw: not know where someone gets off

dt: used to say that one is angry because someone has done something that is not right or has no right to do

dt.t: I do{it}n't know where he gets off{/it} telling me what to do.
{phrase}Where does he get off{/phrase} telling me what to do?

shortdef: —used to say that one is angry because someone has done something that is not right or has no right to do
